Contributor: Keith, Karen, artist.; Edwards & Deutsch Litho. Co., printer.;
Note: Signed ("Karen Keith"?) Date based on America's participation in the war. Initials "XY" appear on bottom left of poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to join the air service to learn and earn. Illustration shows two men in the air force working on a airplane.
